vulnerability_findings.name: array-length-outside-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-nested-if
vulnerability_findings.message: Using nested is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in DIACompanyLockup.allocatePremium (yield.sol#672-677):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(kickerWallet,address(this),premiumAmount)) (yield.sol#675)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lockBoxStructs (yield.sol#676)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: yieldAmount in DIACompanyLockup.deposit (yield.sol#594) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: l in DIACompanyLockup.deposit (yield.sol#616) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in DIACompanyLockup.deposit (yield.sol#591-622):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(yieldWallet,address(this),yieldAmount)) (yield.sol#604)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(kickerWallet,address(this),kickerAmount)) (yield.sol#609)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount)) (yield.sol#613)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lockBoxStructs (yield.sol#620)
